amendment.description: Amendment requires FEMA to annually submit a report to Congress (no later than December 31 of each calendar year) on the effectiveness of grants awarded to local government agencies, the activities conducted and the effect of such activities on the retention or acquisition of flood insurance coverage.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-537 to require the FEMA to annually submit a report (no later than December 31 of each calendar year) to Congress on the effectiveness of grants awarded to local government agencies, the activities conducted and the effect of such activities on the retention or acquisition of flood insurance coverage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Putnam amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
